story.text: (Revised statement from Treasury Department corrects Dec. 29 national debt figure to $8,592.513 billion from $8,592.502 billion in original statement) WASHINGTON, Jan 3 U.S. Treasury balances at the Federal Reserve, based on the Treasury Department's latest budget statement (billions of dollars, except where noted): Dec 29 Dec 28 Fed acct 4.708 4.418 Tax/loan note acct 25.959 28.505 Cash balance 30.667 32.923 National debt, subject to limit 8,592.513 8,505.868 The statutory debt limit is $8.965 trillion. The Treasury said there were $270 million in individual tax refunds and $12 million in corporate tax refunds issued.
story.title: corrected - official - u . s . treasury balances at fed rose on dec . 29
